text:
I'm always bumping into
people with my weapon. After
all, I carry it on my right.

Where's a good place to get
something to eat around here?

If I don't train every so
often, I find myself losing
my edge.

I am Albert. Son of Rudolf,
Marquis of Isthmus, and a
proud knight.

This town is full of things
I have never come across
before.

Is battle approaching? I
want to fulfill my duty as a
knight.

I don't need this attention.
Guess I gotta move around
quicker.

I see this town's got a few
cuties. Might have to steal
some hearts while I'm here.

Everyone gets a clean slate
here, huh? Not that thieving
for a good cause is wrong.

You don't need to worry. I'm
a thief, not a pickpocket.

There's gotta be treasure
somewhere in this town.

Say, you know where the rich
folks live?

Do I work with the fate that
brought me here, or against
it? Hmm, what to do...

This city is surprisingly
small. Why don't they develop
it a bit more?

Well, I'm still free to
stroll around the city.

You believe in cursed
existence? The true curse is
being tied by such a belief.

Do you know where I can find
a weaponsmith?

The blade is nothing but a
tool for murder. Why do men
continue to be seduced by it?

I can never seem to settle
down when I'm on terra firma.

Any chance you can point me
to the harbor?

You know, I still think
about wind direction even
when I'm on land. Old habit.

Think it's okay for a pirate
to be wanderin' around town?

Just gimme a boat, and I'll
return the favor a
hundredfold.

There's talk of pirate
legends around these parts
too. Heh, "legends"...

I'm doing just fine. But
don't be a stranger, okay?

Maybe it's time to look for
something new to wear?

This town is beautiful no
matter what season. It's so
wonderful.

What a lively place this is.
So many kinds of people. That
alone makes it exciting.

Wait a minute. Where am I?
Don't tell me I'm lost.

I can't believe there are
people who'd want to destroy
such a beautiful world.

I find it exhausting being
around so many people.

I never lose my way in the
forest, yet it happens so
easily in town.

There are many men more
dangerous than beasts.

What is it that you expect
from me?

Is this town really this
lively? Or is it some sort of
trick?

A world with a veil cast
over the truth... Is that the
sort of place this is?

I like this city. It is
so... vibrant. Even I am
excited.

You know a place where a
girl can dance? Like a square
or a park?

You think there's a place
for a dancer like me in this
world?

The people in this city seem
a little too busy to me. They
should enjoy life more.

I wonder if there's a nice
gentleman around here who's
man enough for my moves.

No matter where you are,
love is the key. You never
know what tomorrow will bring.
Shall we dance?

Know any all-you-can eat
joints? You really work up an
appetite from dancing.

Dancing isn't about how good
you are. It's about feeling
it inside. Simple, right?

A lot of faces here. If you
don't work hard, you are
likely to be forgotten.

You know anywhere that sells
plus size clothing?

I like this world. Looks
like I'll have some worthy
opponents.

I came here to battle. Now,
it's time to fight.

Is there a weaponsmith
around here? I'm in need of
something big.

There are those who choose
to fight to the death. What
path will I choose here?

Fate must have led us here.
Pleasure to make your
acquaintance.

I require armor for combat.
Please tell me where I can
find such equipment.

Will I ever return to Rosalia?
Try as I might, I simply
cannot forget the place.

Here I am a world apart, yet
there is no respite from
battle.

I need to repair a weapon.
Do tell me where I might find
a weaponsmith.

For now, I will fulfill my
duty on this land, as any
Rose Knight would do.

Hold on! Aren't you
forgetting something? How can
you ignore a cutie like me?

Know any cute stores? The
cheaper the better.

The rules for spells here
are slightly different from
Mardias'. It's harder here.

I am a geckling. Please do
not mistake me for a common
monster.

The townspeople are kind,
even to me. For that I am
grateful.

Which direction is this world
headed? Even my compass
cannot answer that.

What am I supposed to do
here? Please, tell me.

I need to do some thinking.
Is there anywhere I can be
alone?

A world where heroes from
other worlds come together.
Isn't it odd?

I am Gerard. I am still in
training. I have to work much
harder.

Strange. I was going
somewhere, but I forgot where.

Here I get to meet all sorts
of people from other worlds.
How interesting...

One reply is enough. Two is
just unnecessary.

I thought I'd cast my doubts
aside, but no, I'm still not
able to find my way.

You can't change what's
done. Not even Inheritance
Magic can do that.

Best watch where you're
stepping around me.

I worry about where I'm
stepping, but there's nary a
speck of dirt in the city.

I know I should use more
than one skill, but I always
end with Flowing Slash.

Don't approach me from
behind. Not if you want to
live.

What's wrong with this
city's defenses? It's never
been attacked by enemies?

I can understand resorting
to dirty tricks to win. For
in defeat, there is nothing.

Whatever you need, I can
handle it!

I've been patrolling the
city. Haven't spotted anyone
suspicious.

I'm not a soldier from this
world, but I can still
fulfill the duties of one.

You name it, I can do it.
Don't be afraid to ask.

Is there a place where I can
work on my armor around here?

I think there's a reason I
ended up here. Thus, I'll
fulfill my duty.

Nobody's better with a bow
than yours truly. Of course,
I can do other things too.

I always end up thinking
where the best shooting
position is.

Why did I end up here?
'Cause I'm good with a bow?
Or was it just dumb luck?

I know there's no shortage
of fire mages here, but don't
forget about me, okay?

Using Fire Arts in a city's
pretty dangerous, though.

I feel out of place here. I
think the Fire Arts are a
little different.

I hope you'll keep on
training me. I'd really like
that.

Wonder if there's a pyrology
lab around here.

Can't wait to see if I can
learn different Fire Arts in
a different world.

Oh, hi there. Don't hesitate
to come talk to me.

Were you waiting for me?
This is one kind of ambush I
don't mind!

I should study arts besides
fire. Like charm arts, maybe.

I fight when I want to
fight. Just leave me be.

Hey, any barbershops or hair
salons around here? Anything
along those lines?

What happens to this world
ain't my problem. It does
seem like a fun place, though.

Leave it to me. I'll wipe
'em all out.

I'm taking it easy right
now. Gimme some space.

Seems like this world has
quite the history, but me, I
couldn't care less.

I got to... make something
bleed. Take me with you, will
ya?

Is there a dojo or anything
around here? I wanna take on
the best of the best.

Whenever someone tells a
woman to step back, I kinda
lose it.

I'd feel more motivated if
you were, say, the emperor.

This city was designed to be
easy to get around, huh? Not
good for defense, though.

As a member of the Imperial
Guard, it is my sworn duty to
protect this world.

Control over mind, body, and
technique. That's what class
is all about.

Be ready for battle at all
times. Even in a city like
this. One never knows.

If push comes to shove, you
can hide behind me. I'll
protect you.

Since we're defense, we
gotta eat, gotta bulk up,
gotta get big.

Sorry, am I blocking traffic
here?

Parry! Nothing gets past
Parry, NOTHING! Hahaha!
All...hail...Parry!

If I wanted to, I could have
killed you the instant I saw
you.

What a peaceful city. There
isn't a trace of bloodlust in
the air.

Did the thirst for blood in
this land pull me here? I
abhor needless violence.

Everyone is treating me so
kindly. I am most grateful
for that.

Best not to stand in the
front line... In more ways
than one.

This is where I might die.
And a beautiful place it is.
I truly cannot complain.

My only request is that you
put me in a party consisting
only of women.

Isn't there SOMEWHERE
without any men around?!

To be honest, I miss my
father, my husband, my son. I
think of them every day.

My sword is yours, whenever
you may need it.

Hard to believe this city is
facing imminent danger.

Believe. No matter what,
believe. That is the strength
of the Holy Knights.

May good fortune find its
way to you.

I wonder if all these
passersby have found
happiness.

We have come to this world
to end this conflict. That is
what I believe.

I never hesitate when
heading into battle.

I wonder if I might be able
to learn some new spells in
this city.

I feel I lack something
needed for directing holy
power. Don't you agree?
Take me to the ocean, will ya?

It's no fun just strolling
down the streets.

I could swim before I even
learned to crawl.
Let's set sail now!
Land is so boring.

Thankfully, even this world
still has its waterways.

Spirit. Heart. Pride.
Whatever you call it, wear it
on your sleeve!

The folks 'round here don't
work out enough!

If you need a good pair of
fists for something, just
come to me.

I like the nighttime. No
deep meaning. I simply like
it.

Let's see, which house to
pick... I could really do
with some new accessories.

I'm a cat burglar by nature.
That's not going to change
just because I'm here.

I put my money where my
mouth is. Gimme a holler
whenever.

Sometimes guys try to get a
little fresh with me. They
make me sick.

Speed is my forte, so keep
that in mind. I'm no heavy
lifter or anything.

Think anyone'll mind if I
dug meself a 'ole or two?
Heh heh, it's nice and shady.

Thought maybe I was brought
'ere to dig 'oles, but I
think I was wrong on that.

You haven't been blessed
with the gift of flight, have
you? How unfortunate.

Next time, maybe build your
city in the sky?

Who rules the skies in this
world?

Rather convenient to be able
to fly in times like these.

How come those on the ground
are still a nuisance even
when I'm flying?

I give the best, and I
expect the best in return.

It's disappointing people
think female ninjas only win
due to their figures.

I wish I could move quicker
than I do.

It's okay. Being disposable
is a ninja's fate. Discard me
once you're done with me.

Aaahahahahaha! I've finally
found you. Prepare to suffer!

So, where are you going?
That is to say, where are you
taking me?

I figured since you called
on me, I should give
something in return.

You found me. Goes to show
just how much more I have to
learn.

Hey, think maybe one of you
could build a ninja house
sometime?

I don't know if ninja arts
will do any good here, but
I'll give everything I have.

Will I be okay in the sun?
Of course, don't be silly.

Think I should call a
servant spirit? I suppose
that would cause trouble.

You must really be in a
pinch if you've had to summon
a vampire for help.

You don't see me as some
kind of monster?

So many people look alike
here. It's easy to get mixed
up.

If you don't ally yourself
with the spirits, you're sure
to lose this battle.

How are things? Remember
that you need passion in your
life.

It would be nice to ride the
waves again, after so long.

There must be powerful foes
needing besting on the seas.
I would enjoy nothing more.
I'm up to the task!

This feels somewhat...
familiar.

Apparently I saved the world
once. I can't believe I might
need to save it again.
How are you doing?

Wonder where all the pretty
ladies are hiding.

Don't understand this
myself. Is this the future?
Or some other world?
You look raring to go today.

I'm way too cool for this
dump.

It's nice to forget reality
sometimes.

I'm ready any time you need
me. Just say the word.

I will defend this city to
the last.

I'll make sure your faith in
me was never misplaced. I
promise you that.

I wonder if I can meet your
expectations.

Walking around like this,
nothing seems to have
changed, yet...

This land was rife with
monsters years ago too. I'm
surprised it still is.
Do you have urgent business?

Loanne? What a strange
sensation.

If we cannot count on the
current Marquis of Loanne, I
am ready to take charge.
Has something happened?!

It's nice being able to walk
around freely like this.

I will defend Loanne no
matter the time or place.
That is my duty.
What am I doing here?

I feel kind of dizzy, like
I'm seeing double.

We really saved this world
before? I still can't believe
it.

The people of today should
be the ones saving the world
of today, shouldn't they?

Don't worry, I won't go
swinging my axe around town.

If we have to do it, then
we'd better face it head on.

I'm happy to have come to
this world.

Just being here almost
brings me to tears.

I can't believe I get to
fight for Loanne again,
terrible as this all is.

The people of this age have
been forced to respond to the
same crisis.

There are all sorts of
facilities here. Have you
been to them all?

Fight with me. For Loanne,
and for the world.
Well, I see you've found me.

I wonder if I missed any
houses while delivering
presents.

Whatever the world, I always
want to see smiles on the
children's faces.

Normally it's best not to
stand out.

The city's changed somewhat.
I guess that's to be expected.

If I was summoned here,
would it be possible to
summon multiple Masquerades?

Thank you for thinking about
me. This just may be my final
farewell.

I will protect Loanne with
my life.

If someone doesn't sacrifice
themselves, we'll all die. I
will step forward.

Hello there. How are you all
doing?

Being able to walk like this
makes me so, so happy.

I've no doubt I was brought
here for a reason. I will
fight to save this world.
Oh, it's you.

I like this place more than
Pidona.

Am I qualified to fight
here? Tell me how you really
feel.

Let me know when you're
heading into battle. I need
to stay sharp.
I should work out a little.

I see the Shucho Arts are as
powerful as ever. This will
work.

Sorry, I have things on my
mind right now.

I hope Lady Muse has made it
here as well.

Will fighting here protect
Lady Muse? I can't stop
worrying about her.

Enhancing your weapons is
important. You'll regret it
if you don't.

All right, better get over
to the Forge.

I'm so happy I can be a
blacksmith again. Of course,
there'll be a lot of work.
I would gladly fight for you.
Hahahahaha! Aaahahahahaha!

Wherever evil lurks in this
world, Robin the Crusader
will be there to thwart it!

I see you're looking happy
as ever today.

I guess I stand out just a
little too much in this
outfit.

What has become of Yarmouth?
I'm worried about it too.

Hey. What do you say we put
in some work together?

The food here is amazing.
Can't believe my luck.

Won't need to worry about
money here. Yeah, I'm gonna
go to town all right.

Yo ho ho! Ye get to work for
me.

Everything in this town be
too... orderly. Doesn't feel
right.

I's a pirate before, and
I'll keep piratin' here. I be
no superhero.

Hurry up and take me to the
ocean!

This city isn't kind to its
elders.

If Forneus returns, I'll've
me vengeance. No matter how
many times he comes back.

I want to go hunting outside
the walls. Think that would
be okay?

Western cities are odd. How
interesting.

I wonder what's become of
the east. Of course, I'll
abide by your instructions.
Present time!

The reason I don't melt here
is because I have the
Everfrost Crystal with me.

Come, let us make haste and
go travel the world!

If there's something you
don't understand, learn by
getting hands-on.
You can go wherever you like.

I find your presence
soothing. Therefore, I too
will do my best.

We should talk every once in
a while.

You know what would be
perfect around here? A big
manor.

I will unify all Genbu mages
in this world. Good idea,
don't you think?

What do you think of Shucho
mages? Dreadful things,
aren't they?
New Vanguard... I like it.

I wonder if I'll get into
conflicts with Shucho mages
here too. I'm sick of them.

Please don't think it's okay
to touch me without
permission.
My, you're tiresome.

This means there are two of
me, but would that not upset
the balance of the world?

I don't mind an enthusiastic
demeanor from you from time
to time.

Don't make me wander around
outside too much.

Will a relic of the
Matriarch be needed again?
Even I do not know.

Whoa, careful there. Touch
me and you'll get burned.

The fewer wooden buildings
there are the better.

I burn enemies to nothing.
Simple. The world's better
when things are simple.

What do you think of Genbu
mages? Rather pathetic, no?

The Fire Fortress... How I'd
love to see that with my own
eyes.

The Shucho and Genbu Arts
must be brought together. Yet
I doubt humans could ever be.

This certainly is quite a
difference from where I'm
from.

I don't do very well in
large towns.

Please let me know if you
need anything. After all, I
am a mayor.
Will you fight against me?

Well! I see there's a dojo
here. That I need to see.

Did you summon me here to
train? Or to enlist my help?

You needn't call on me. In
fact, I prefer to be alone.
Are the locals big on magic?

I wouldn't mind completing
my training here. As long as
I don't run into... him.

I often see people here who
look alike. Are they twins
too?

There don't seem to be any
runes in this town.

If I was summoned here, I
suppose he'll be summoned
here too.

Did you pet me just now?
That felt kinda nice.

I guess monsters and humans
live together in peace here,
huh?

Will anyone here know about
the Rings? Hope I can find
'em and get back to Margmel.

Howdy! How ya doing? I am
juuust fine.

This city's really fun,
ain't it? I just love it here.

Feels like I'm in a whole
other region. Are there Rings
of Power here too?

You can all relax!
Alkaiser's here!
Where are the bad guys at!

Since I was summoned here as
Alkaiser, I suppose I have to
stay in this form?

I don't see anyone nearly as
cool as me around here.

Aren't there any cute girls
in this town?

This world must have at
least one evil organization
as well. Evil is everywhere.

Don't just call out to me
like that. Things could get
bloody.

I don't want to be wandering
around. Isn't there somewhere
I can relax?

This talk about the threat
to the world is so complex. I
don't really get it.

There's something you want
to ask me, isn't there?

It's interesting here. Lots
of different fashions.

I'm not interested in really
big organizations, but what
choice do I have, right?

You haven't seen a mage in
blue, have you?

I am on a quest to learn new
magic.

Can you understand what it's
like to suddenly be rejected
from your destiny?

At least give me the
opportunity to refine the
abilities I already know.

It doesn't look like I'll be
acquiring any new abilities
here.

I was surely dragged into a
world like this precisely
because I'm not yet ready.

I wonder if the day will
come when I return to the
Magic Realm.

Who knows how far from home
I am.

Even if I find a mage in
blue, there's no guarantee
they will be my other half.

You. Come with me. You can
do whatever, but I need a
drink.

Know where I can get a
drink? A bar, a pub, a
tavern... Anything.

I've had too much to drink.
That's why I'm seeing all
this... stuff. Yep.

Anything long and narrow can
be used as a weapon.

Looks like this is some new
region I'm in.

Saving your world won't
bring back Wakatu. But I'll
do it anyway. For your sake.

I'm just a grunt here. But
it's good to meet you.

I guess too much free time
can be a bad thing as well.

Someone must be manipulating
this world too. You have to
stop them!
Come, let us fight together.

Are there five-leaf akebia
here somewhere?

Steel swords seem to be
everywhere here. What a
curious world.

Do you not need to work or
something?

Wonder which direction I
should be heading.

If there are Quells here,
that alone means something
real bad's going on.

You hear about an easy
payday, you come find me,
okay?

I don't smell many...
opportunities in this town.

I wanna make my fortune here
and go back home with my
head held high.

I've got high aspirations.
I'm just flat broke, that's
all.

You seen someone carrying
around a reeeally big egg?

If the Egg came here too,
we'd be in some serious
trouble. I'd fight it again.
Hi there! I am doing great.

Isn't there anything fun to
do around here? I'm bored to
death.

I feel Anima in this world
too. So I'll be okay. I can
do what I do best.

What are you thinking?
Leaving a young girl like me
by herself?

I don't sense any Quells in
this town.

Perhaps here I'll be able to
meet my father. I wonder what
I'd say to him.

The more people there are,
the easier it is to blend in.
Simple.

You can relax. I wouldn't
take someone's life in a
place like this.

Why has someone like me
ended up here? Why?!
I am still alive.

If you ever come across me
lying in a gutter, promise me
you'll end me quick.

Who would've thought I'd be
doing one last job. The
Scorpions aren't here yet?

It doesn't look like you
want me to protect you.
Follow me. I'll protect you.

What am I supposed to do
here? Well, at least no one
will boss me around.
You need something?
Stay outta my way.

I can raise as much hell as
I want here, huh? And don't
try to stop me either.

I'm going to work hard to
gain the trust of those
around me.

I will help rebuild our
cities.

As king, there are many
things for me to do. I must
return to Escata.

I don't think I'm going to
be of any use to you. Please
accept my apologies.

I'm sorry, I was in a fog
there.

I'm all alone. Even here.
Were I to die, who would even
shed a tear?

Leave the monster
exterminating to me!

Hope I can find something
nicer to wear.

There are some amazing women
in this world. I hope to
become just like them.

Please come to me with any
orders you may have.

The House of Julanius always
moves forward without
wavering.

We should be proud to lead
humanity into this battle for
the world.

The Grave Knights know all
about monsters. That could
lead me to who's taken Liz.

I became a Grave Knight to
save Liz. At least, that was
my only reason at the time.

What happened to the world
300 years ago? And what's
happening to it now?

It is I, Shen Du of the
Ministry of the Cosmos of the
country of Dae. You are?

The Rise of Morastrum, the
lost memories... Master Dahao
recorded everything.

Master Dahao said when the
old and new stars meet, the
hour of destiny will return.

For some reason, there is no
clear record of one star...
The eighth star.

Determining who is creating
the Graves is the key to
saving the world.

How we live. How we die. We
must never cease to
contemplate these.

Don Scaccini... Just a dirty
weapons dealer if you ask me.

I'm one of a kind. Scaccini,
on the other hand, is the
dirtiest old man there is.

Boss here. I repeat, Boss
here. Do you read me?

Uhh... Umm... Merry
Christmas! Is that how you
say it?

I hear one is meant to give
presents, but where would one
get hold of such things?

I wish you peace and
happiness.

Whoever wants presents, come
closer!
Ginny Santa, coming through!

I gotta say, this is kinda
fun.

It's fun giving things to
people too.

Dressed like this, people
might be expecting me to
climb down their chimneys.

Don't worry, I haven't given
your present away.

I'll get some attention in
this outfit. Which is exactly
what I want.

You can't get away from me.
There's no point trying to
run.

I don't wanna go back to my
world. I'm never gonna leave
this place.

We're all looking for that
special someone.

I feel a little embarrassed
walking around the city
dressed like this.
I have a special someone. You.

It's a new year, so I just
wanted to say thanks again.
My fate's in your hands.

We going out on a job
already? I don't mind. Beats
sitting around all day.

Nothing wrong with taking
things easy today.

Happy New Year to you. And
thank you for everything
you've done for me.

Isn't anyone going to dress
up?

I want to cherish each and
every year. So let's take the
time to celebrate.

Is this how you're supposed
to behave when you visit a
shrine at New Year's?

Sweet sake? Thank you, but I
don't drink.

I hope next year I'll be
able to celebrate the new
year with Liz.

It's a new year. Let's try
to raise our spirits around
here.
It's a march around town!

Want me to bite you? I hear
that if I do, you won't get
sick or injured ever again.
Happy New Year.

Are you telling me there's
no shrine around here?

People pray to God despite
knowing that in the end, it
is we who must act.

I greatly appreciate your
courteous greeting.

There are strong warriors
here. I feel the itch to
challenge them.

I'd part ways with you
before I'd betray the oath I
and the others have taken.

I do not mind what has
happened. I am used to fading
into obscurity.

Full of riffraff, this town
is.
